CustomField.description: The Contact related to this Seat. If there is an Attendee related to this Seat and that Attendee has a related Contact, this Contact lookup will be automatically set.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Contact related to this Seat. If there is an Attendee related to this Seat and that Attendee has a related Contact, this Contact lookup will be automatically set.
CustomField.label: Contact
